pages.text: Ate alaha nu niradharita kite dina vica yada karo. Phira jihara bada jaladi hi do dinam vica maka vapasa a jave. Usa upara ko'i papa nahim ate jihara bada ruka jave usa upara vi ko'i papa nahim. Iha usa la'i hai jihara alaha tom dare ate tusim alaha tom darade raho ate cagi tar'ham jana lavo ki tusim usa de kola ikathe kite javoge
Ate lokam vicom ko'i ajiha hai ki usa di gala isa sasarika jivana vica tuhanu bhali pratita hudi hai ate uha apane dila di gala upara alaha nu gavaha bana'unda hai, halanki uha bahuta jhagaralu hai
Ate jadom uha muha pherada hai tam uha isa yatana vica rahida hai ki uha dharati upara phasada phailave ate khetam ate pranam nu nasata kare, halanki alaha phasada nu pasada nahim karada
Ate jadom usa nu kiha janda hai ki alaha tom dara. Tam hakara usa nu papa upara jama dida hai, ajihe bade la'i naraka nisacata hai ate uha bahuta bura tikana hai
Ate lokam vicom ko'i ajiha hai ki alaha di prasanata di talasa vica uha apane panam nu nichavara kara dida hai ate alaha apane badi'am upara bahuta rahima vala hai
He imana vali'o! Isalama vica pure de pure lina ho ja'u ate saitana de pada-cinham upara na calom uha tuhada pratakha dusamana hai
Jekara tusim' til'haka ja'um isa tom ba'ada ki tuhade kola sapasata taraka a zuke hana tam jana lavo alaha asima sakatisali hai ate sarava- gi'ata hai
Ki loka isa udika vica hana ki alaha (khuda) badalam di cham vica ave ate farisate vi a jana ate mamale da phaisala kara dita jave ate sare mamale alaha vala hi maure jande hana
